description: Kent sign New Zealand left-arm seamer Ben Lister on a deal until the end of the season.
title: Ben Lister: Kent sign New Zealand left-arm bowler
title_page: Ben Lister: Kent sign New Zealand left-arm bowler - BBC Sport
maintext:
Kent have signed New Zealand international Ben Lister on a deal until the end of the season.
The 27-year-old left-arm seamer will be available for the final three matches of the County Championship campaign.
Lister is also eligible to feature in One-Day Cup matches, depending on his commitments with the Black Caps.
"He is a rising talent and will provide an added dimension to our bowling attack," Kent director of cricket Paul Downton told the club website., external
Lister has taken 67 first-class wickets at an average of 27.13, with a further 50 scalps in List A competition at an average of 35.92 and an economy rate of 5.47 runs an over.
